about: Hello! My name is Reese Shu and I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. ......
heroSubtitle: I build things for the business web.

workProjects.title: Halcyon Theme
workProjects.description: A minimal, dark blog theme for Ghost. Built with vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

workProjects.title: Spotify Profile
workProjects.description: A web app for visualizing personalized Spotify data. Built with React, Express, and the Spotify Web API.

experienceJobs.title: Lead Engineer
experienceJobs.description: Lead a team of engineers in building scalable web applications using React, Node.js, and TypeScript. Mentored junior developers and established coding standards.

experienceJobs.title: Senior Frontend Developer
experienceJobs.description: Developed and maintained high-traffic web applications serving millions of users. Collaborated with design teams to implement pixel-perfect UIs.
